fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
The 6 dolla meme comes from an eccentric community member "QueenA" that always came into the Discord back in 2018 and only ask one question " wen 6 dolla" and it persisted for months until he left the community. However the meme stays on and become the mantra and schelling point of price target for the Synthetix community. 

Recent developments have shown us that it was not ambitious enough so we changed it to sixty dollars (see **question 52**).
